Description:
What we are looking for:8 to 15 years of combined experience performing cyber security analysis, exposure management, threat hunting, cyber threat intelligence and/or incident response activities.
Demonstratable expertise in managing technology components, configurations, security tooling, and infrastructure (endpoint, network, identity, applications, and data structures).
Demonstratable expertise in foreniscally assessing common network communication protocols (e.g., Ethernet, TCP/IP) and endpoint systems.
Strong understanding related to industrial networking protocols (ModBus, CIP, OPC, etc.) as well as supporting topologies and leading OT defense practices are required for this role.
A positive attitude, strong analytical skills, excellent written and oral communication skills, and the ability to work with diverse teams and world-wide peers collaboratively.
Cybersecurity certifications paired with hands-on delivery of concepts enhance competitiveness for this position, but are not required.
Degrees in Cyber Security, Engineering (Electrical, Mechanical, Chemical, or similar), Computer Science, or similar scientific / technical field is required for this role.
Self-motivated, driven to learn, and adaptability to support the team and an ever-evolving threat landscape.Job Details
